properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.access-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Access Key.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.amazon-athena-client
properties.description: The AmazonAthena instance to use as the client. The option is a software.amazon.awssdk.services.athena.AthenaClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.client-request-token
properties.description: A unique string to ensure issues queries are idempotent. It is unlikely you will need to set this.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.configuration
properties.description: The component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.aws2.athena.Athena2Configuration type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.database
properties.description: The Athena database to use.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.delay
properties.description: Milliseconds before the next poll for query execution status. See the section 'Waiting for Query Completion and Retrying Failed Queries' to learn more.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the aws2-athena component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.encryption-option
properties.description: The encryption type to use when storing query results in S3. One of SSE_S3, SSE_KMS, or CSE_KMS.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.include-trace
properties.description: Include useful trace information at the beginning of queries as an SQL comment (prefixed with --).

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.initial-delay
properties.description: Milliseconds before the first poll for query execution status. See the section 'Waiting for Query Completion and Retrying Failed Queries' to learn more.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.kms-key
properties.description: For SSE-KMS and CSE-KMS, this is the KMS key ARN or ID.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of times to attempt a query. Set to 1 to disable retries. See the section 'Waiting for Query Completion and Retrying Failed Queries' to learn more.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.max-results
properties.description: Max number of results to return for the given operation (if supported by the Athena API endpoint). If not set, will use the Athena API default for the given operation.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.next-token
properties.description: Pagination token to use in the case where the response from the previous request was truncated.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.operation
properties.description: The Athena API function to call.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.output-location
properties.description: The location in Amazon S3 where query results are stored, such as s3://path/to/query/bucket/. Ensure this value ends with a forward slash ('/').

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.output-type
properties.description: How query results should be returned. One of StreamList (default - return a GetQueryResultsIterable that can page through all results), SelectList (returns at most 1,000 rows at a time, plus a NextToken value as a header than can be used for manual pagination of results), S3Pointer (return an S3 path pointing to the results).

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.profile-credentials-name
properties.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter will set the profile name

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.proxy-host
properties.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the Athena client.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.proxy-port
properties.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the Athena client.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.proxy-protocol
properties.description: To define a proxy protocol when instantiating the Athena client.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.query-execution-id
properties.description: The unique ID identifying the query execution.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.query-string
properties.description: The SQL query to run. Except for simple queries, prefer setting this as the body of the Exchange or as a header using Athena2Constants.QUERY_STRING to avoid having to deal with URL encoding issues.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.region
properties.description: The region in which Athena client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the lowercase name of the region (for example ap-east-1). You'll need to use the name Region.EU_WEST_1.id().

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.reset-wait-timeout-on-retry
properties.description: Reset the waitTimeout countdown in the event of a query retry. If set to true, potential max time spent waiting for queries is equal to waitTimeout x maxAttempts. See the section 'Waiting for Query Completion and Retrying Failed Queries' to learn more.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.retry
properties.description: Optional comma separated list of error types to retry the query for. Use 'retryable' to retry all retryable failure conditions (e.g. generic errors and resources exhausted), 'generic' to retry 'GENERIC_INTERNAL_ERROR' failures, 'exhausted' to retry queries that have exhausted resource limits, 'always' to always retry regardless of failure condition, or 'never' or null to never retry (default). See the section 'Waiting for Query Completion and Retrying Failed Queries' to learn more.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.secret-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Secret Key.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.use-default-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the Athena client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.use-profile-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the Athena client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.wait-timeout
properties.description: Optional max wait time in millis to wait for a successful query completion. See the section 'Waiting for Query Completion and Retrying Failed Queries' to learn more.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-athena.work-group
properties.description: The workgroup to use for running the query.
